buffer.description: Minimum distance between cell centroid and spatial domain boundary. Simulation stops when this criterion is no longer satisfied.

cpm_area_c.description: Cellular Potts model area constraint coefficient; required for CPM methods. A cell is initialized with this area.

cpm_area_v.description: Cellular Potts model area constraint value; required for CPM methods.

cpm_nbs_n.description: Cellular Potts model copy attempt neighbor order; required for CPM methods.

cpm_perim_c.description: Cellular Potts model perimeter constraint coefficient; required for CPM methods. A cell is initialized with this area.

cpm_perim_v.description: Cellular Potts model perimeter constraint value; required for CPM methods. A cell is initialized with this area.

len_1.description: Spatial domain length along the first spatial dimension. A cell is initialized with a centroid halfway along this length in the first dimension.

len_2.description: Spatial domain length along the second spatial dimension. A cell is initialized with a centroid halfway along this length in the second dimension.

method.description: Methodology label; one of those defined in supported methods.

model.description: Persistent random walk model label; one of those defined in supported models.

model_args.description: Persistent random walk model parameters; empty if none required.
